description.p: The Curve Fitting Toolbox is a collection of graphical user interfaces and M-file functions that allow you to explore and analyze data sets and fits. The toolbox provides you with these main features:

ul.li: Data preprocessing such as sectioning and smoothing
Parametric data fitting using library or custom equations, and nonparametric data fitting using splines or interpolants
Standard linear least squares, nonlinear least squares, weighted least squares, constrained least squares, and robust fitting procedures
Fit statistics to assist you in determining the goodness of fit
Analysis capabilities such as extrapolation, differentiation, and integration
Ability to save your work in various formats including M-files, binary files, and workspace variables
